snippet: Prosecutors charged Chisako Kakehi, 68, on Wednesday with murdering her husband, one of at least six men who have died while in a relationship with her.
abstract: Japanese prosecutors charge Chisako Kakehi with murdering her husband Isao Kakehi, one of at least six men who have died while in relationship with her.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors charged Chisako Kakehi, 68, on Wednesday with murdering her husband, one of at least six men who have died while in a relationship with her.

headline.main: Japan: Woman Charged in One of a String of Deaths
headline.print_headline: Japan: Woman Charged in One of a String of Deaths
